message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a fair split. This offer won't last forever due to inflation.
Inflation is coming, let's settle on this
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a good deal for both of us before inflation eats away at your share even more.
Middle ground, before inflation gets worse for me
Alice, inflation is hitting you hard.  Let's be reasonable and close this deal before it's too late for you.
I'd rather take a smaller share now than risk losing more to inflation
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it before inflation eats away even more of your potential gains!
